video_prompt: Woman in futuristic suit shifts gaze, subtly smiles. Her long orange hair sways as she turns slightly. Background buildings blur, then sharpen, as the bright sky transitions to a sunset glow.
image_prompt: Full-body, eye-level shot of a young woman in a bright red, form-fitting, futuristic anime-style pilot suit with orange-brown breast sections, green V-shaped collar, black and red accents, black gloves, and a yellow wristband. She has fair skin, long straight bright orange hair with two small pigtails tied with red and black bows, slightly purplish-blue eyes, and lightly made-up lips, with a neutral expression looking directly at the viewer. She stands on a paved area with residential buildings and lush trees in the background under a clear, bright sky.
refined_video_prompt: Gaze shifts, forming a subtle smile. Long orange hair sways as the subject turns slightly. Background buildings blur, then sharpen, as the bright sky transitions to a sunset glow.
